# Create NULL list
```{r ICC List}
iccl <- list(list(), list())
names(icc)[1] <- "Self - Friend"
names(icc)[2] <- "Self - Stranger"

res[[3]] <- list()
names(res)[3] <- "ICC"
```

# ICC: Self - Friend
```{r ICC of RT, message= FALSE}
df.rt <- icc(df = df[[2]], indice = "rt", Target = "Friend")
```

```{r ICC of ACC, message= FALSE}
df.acc <- icc(df = df[[2]],indice = "acc", Target = "Friend")
```

```{r ICC of Dprime, message= FALSE}
df.dp <- icc(df = df[[2]],indice = "dp", Target = "Friend")
```

```{r ICC of Efficiency, message= FALSE}
df.eff <- icc(df = df[[2]],indice = "eff", Target = "Friend")
```

```{r ICC of ezDDM: v, message= FALSE}
df.ddmv <- icc(df = df[[2]],indice = "ddmv", Target = "Friend")
```

```{r ICC of ezDDM: z, message= FALSE}
df.ddmz <- icc(df = df[[2]],indice = "ddmz", Target = "Friend")
```

```{r DF for Plot ICC}
iccl[[1]] <- list(df.rt, df.acc, df.dp, df.eff, df.ddmv, df.ddmz) 

rm(df.rt, df.acc, df.dp, df.eff, df.ddmv, df.ddmz)
```

```{r DF for Plot ICC}
res[[3]][[1]] <- ICC_calculation(SPE_ICC = iccl[[1]]) %>%
  dplyr::filter(type == "ICC2" | type == "ICC2k")
names(res[[3]])[1] <- "Self - Friend"
```

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
